Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: Twilio Streak Messaging Chrome Extension

Features:
- Chrome extension with side panel UI
- Twilio Conversations API integration
- Streak CRM integration with role-based access control
- Contact name lookup and caching
- Real-time message updates (5-second polling)
- Conversation filtering by Streak boxes
- Pagination support (50 conversations per page)
- Toast notifications for better UX
- Secure CORS configuration
- Next.js backend API deployed to Vercel
